pullrequest.title: Remove prerelease source list for Ignition Gazebo in Docker

content.raw:
The problem seems to be caused when installing `libignition-physics-dartsim-dev` / `libdart6-*` libraries.

@{557058:5de38267-b118-494c-aa76-4fab35448816} @{557058:90bc87b0-2886-4377-a17c-3a6629a697ff} . Do we still need the prerelease repo? Maybe there is a better way to fix this?
content.html:
The problem seems to be caused when installing libignition-physics-dartsim-dev / libdart6-* libraries.

@Steve Peters @Addisu Z. Taddese . Do we still need the prerelease repo? Maybe there is a better way to fix this?
